item.title: Create a large file on Linux
item.description: Sometimes we need to have a random file of given size. We can name some common examples such as Test the file upload functionality Test if the application is able to handle a large set of data On Linux we can create an empty file of particular size with the dd command.

item.title: Rake task backup database rails
item.description: 1namespace :mysql_tool do 2task backup: :environment do 3backup_dir = Settings.dig(:mysql_tool, :backup_dir) 4raise "Not support environment #{Rails.env}" unless backup_dir 56FileUtils.mkdir_p backup_dir unless File.
